strings.Value: "You could have refused to comply with their demands, to commit those evil deeds. But you agreed to it, and so you are also guilty."
"You were ordered to destroy kingdoms, bringing unbearable suffering and pain to so many people. No matter what you have done, those who came up with this 'punishment' are clearly no better!"
"You messed with an enemy more powerful than yourself. That is why you're undoubtedly guilty â€” guilty of foolishness."
"It breaks my heart to see what this curse turned you into, in the end..."
"Cursed... cursed... cursed..." {n}the nymph whispers.{/n} "Did I truly deserve all this...?"
"So many wish to judge me... For someone who cannot comprehend the burden of the curse, you assume far too much! Burn!"
